remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对数据源的查询返回的数据与之间的主映射 。A provides a master mapping between the data returned from a query against a data source, and a . 可以将名称替换 为 `Fill` **DataAdapter**的方法。The name can be passed in place of the name to the `Fill` method of the **DataAdapter**. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [DataAdapter DataTable And DataColumn 映射](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象并将其添加到 中。The following example creates a object and adds it to a . 然后，它会通知用户已将映射添加到集合，并显示父映射。It then informs the user that the mapping was added to the collection and displays the parent mapping. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 存在，则返回它。If the exists, it is returned. 如果不 存在，对于给定的 ，将发生下列操作：If the does not exist, for a given , the following actions occur: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|采取的操作Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|使用指定的源列名称作为源列名称和 列名称创建一个。Creates a with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the column name. 这 不会添加到集合中。This is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|如果缺少指定的列映射，则生成 。An is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|获取 null 值。Gets a null value.|
